    • Method Detail

      • add

        public CertificatePinner.Builder add(java.lang.String hostname,
                            java.lang.String... pins)
        Pins certificates for hostname. Each pin is a SHA-1 hash of a certificate's Subject Public Key Info, base64-encoded and prefixed with "sha1/".
